import React from "react"; import "./Cards.css"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Cards = (props) => { const { mealtype, mealtypeId, content, image } = props.data; const navigate = useNavigate(); const showFilter = (mealtypeId) => { navigate(`/filter?mealtype=${mealtypeId}`); }; return (
showFilter(mealtypeId)}>

{mealtype}

{content}

{/*

Lunch

Start your day with exclusive lunch options

Snacks

Start your day with exclusive snacks options

Dinner

Start your day with exclusive dinner options

Drinks

Start your day with exclusive drinks options

Night-Life

Start your evening with exclusive night-life options

*/}
); }; export default Cards;
